message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be incredibly valuable for you. I've priced it at $13,000 to reflect its worth. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking to keep my investment within $15,000. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $10,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your desire to stay within budget. How about we meet halfway and settle on $11,500? This reflects a fair price for both of us.
